<Heading
  as={"h1"}

  children={"Verify Voter ID Details"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/zoop/voter/{ver}/{lang}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Verifies voter ID details and retrieves comprehensive electoral information including constituency details, polling booth information, and personal details.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ver","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Current version of API","schema":{"type":"string","example":"1.0"}},{"name":"lang","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Language for response (default en)","schema":{"type":"string","default":"en","example":"en"}},{"name":"Authentication","in":"header","required":true,"description":"JSON Web Token (JWT) created and signed by the authentication server","schema":{"type":"string","example":"EkN-DOsnsuRjRO6BxXemmJDm3HbxrbRzXglbN2S4sOkopdU4IsDxTI8jO19W_A4K8ZPJijNLis4EzsHeY559a4DFOd50_OqgHGuERTqYZyuhtF39yxJPAjUESwxk2J5k_4zM3O-vtd1Ghyo4IbqKKSy6J9mTniYJPenn5-HiirE"}},{"name":"api-key","in":"header","required":false,"description":"A unique key provided by the platform (24-character alphanumeric string, lowercase only)","schema":{"type":"string","example":"434950ee34353tty33463399"}},{"name":"client-id","in":"header","required":true,"description":"Base64 encoded Client Id provided during onboarding","schema":{"type":"string","example":"pNRxiviTvgBrf7qMANqBVskDYfEa"}},{"name":"provider","in":"header","required":true,"description":"Service provider code","schema":{"type":"string","example":"134"}},{"name":"x-env-route","in":"header","required":false,"description":"Header required to access the sandbox environment (not required for production)","schema":{"type":"string","example":"/sb"}},{"name":"x-zoop-api-key","in":"header","required":true,"description":"ZOOP API key generated for the lender","schema":{"type":"string","example":"HCG997A-4V5MXEM-J40KGVA-E8MN1N1"}},{"name":"x-zoop-app-id","in":"header","required":true,"description":"ZOOP app ID generated for the lender","schema":{"type":"string","example":"681c70a88c0cdd00101457e9"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["meta","data","hmac"],"properties":{"meta":{"type":"object","required":["txncode","ver","ts"],"properties":{"txncode":{"type":"string","description":"Unique transaction code provided by the lender","example":"TXN123456"},"ver":{"type":"string","description":"Version associated with the service","example":"1.0"},"ts":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp in ISO-8601 format indicating time of request initiation","example":"2024-06-27T12:26:45Z"}}},"data":{"type":"string","description":"Base64 encoded XML with voter verification details","example":""},"hmac":{"type":"string","description":"SHA-256 hash of the value under the key 'data'","example":"wAqy8gf+uS5j5naWleuCZejR7X2TOin/KjwsUm0Q9Ms="}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful voter ID verification","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"result":{"type":"object","properties":{"errcode":{"type":"string","description":"Error code - 'E000' indicates success","example":"E000"},"status":{"type":"string","description":"Transaction status","enum":["success","failed"],"example":"success"}}},"data":{"type":"object","properties":{"address":{"type":"object","properties":{"district_code":{"type":"string","description":"Code representing the district","example":"001"},"district_name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the district (in English)","example":"Central Delhi"},"district_name_vernacular":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the district (in vernacular/local language)","example":"केंद्रीय दिल्ली"},"state":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the state","example":"Delhi"},"state_code":{"type":"string","description":"Code representing the state","example":"07"}}},"user_age":{"type":"integer","description":"Age of the user based on electoral records","example":35},"assembly_constituency_name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the state assembly constituency (in English)","example":"New Delhi"},"assembly_constituency_name_vernacular":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the state assembly constituency (vernacular)","example":"नई दिल्ली"},"assembly_constituency_number":{"type":"string","description":"Assembly constituency number","example":"001"},"constituency_part_name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the polling part/ward (in English)","example":"Connaught Place"},"constituency_part_name_vernacular":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the polling part/ward (vernacular)","example":"कनॉट प्लेस"},"constituency_part_number":{"type":"string","description":"Number assigned to the polling part","example":"001"},"constituency_section_number":{"type":"string","description":"Section number within the polling part","example":"1"},"epic_number":{"type":"string","description":"EPIC (Voter ID) number of the user","example":"ABC1234567890"},"user_gender":{"type":"string","description":"Gender of the user","enum":["M","F","T"],"example":"M"},"parliamentary_constituency_name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the parliamentary constituency (in English)","example":"New Delhi"},"parliamentary_constituency_name_vernacular":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the parliamentary constituency (vernacular)","example":"नई दिल्ली"},"parliamentary_constituency_number":{"type":"string","description":"Number assigned to the parliamentary constituency","example":"004"},"polling_booth":{"type":"object","properties":{"lat_long":{"type":"string","description":"Latitude and longitude of the polling booth","example":"28.6139,77.2090"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"Name and address of the polling booth (in English)","example":"Government School, Connaught Place"},"name_vernacular":{"type":"string","description":"Name and address of the polling booth (vernacular)","example":"सरकारी स्कूल, कनॉट प्लेस"},"number":{"type":"string","description":"Booth number of the polling station","example":"001"}}},"relative_name_english":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the voter's relative (in English)","example":"Robert Doe"},"relative_name_vernacular":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the voter's relative (vernacular)","example":"रॉबर्ट डो"},"relative_relation":{"type":"string","description":"Relation type (FTHR - Father, MTHR - Mother, HUSB - Husband)","enum":["FTHR","MTHR","HUSB","WIFE","OTHR"],"example":"FTHR"},"serial_number_applicable_part":{"type":"string","description":"Serial number within the applicable part of the roll","example":"123"},"status":{"type":"string","description":"Status flag (N - normal, D - deleted, etc.)","example":"N"},"user_name_english":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the user (in English)","example":"John Doe"},"user_name_vernacular":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the user (vernacular)","example":"जॉन डो"},"voter_last_updated_date":{"type":"string","format":"date","description":"Last updated date of the voter record","example":"2024-01-15"},"name_match_score":{"type":"string","description":"Name match score if name matching addon is requested","example":"16.50"}}},"signature":{"type":"string","description":"Digital signature hash of the data for integrity verification","example":"MGUCMBT2op6n9evwi0d4VDxyx4AjhkmrMxlUA71d2b4d0Yt9Gee/QuzZreuTildXdSTd6gIxAJ4Utkl64L6P/9B/ZrEMvxXWefL4QpUUHPI2EwrFqCZor8OxLyAoCf0EcBAfLPT4mA=="},"meta":{"type":"object","properties":{"txncode":{"type":"string","description":"Transaction identifier","example":"TXN123456"},"ver":{"type":"string","description":"Response format version","example":"1.0"},"ts":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp in ISO-8601 format","example":"2025-05-09T12:00:47Z"}}},"hmac":{"type":"string","description":"SHA256 HMAC of the data payload","example":"FLBbMCsSmAP9T+suAXC0KbJ19AOzQYp2LreP7goNHYU="},"publickey":{"type":"string","description":"Platform public key for signature verification","example":"MHYwEAYHKoZIzj0CAQYFK4EEACIDYgAETSwSJlJmF6JEqiu8F4pW1KDppDCVwfJgdBx/pTLopUwfB7mBIDkKVM/ZMa4f9QoOYxtVTp4p6nvx8/rB08e9QHNNNNbmof7/cndQhb3h+VIwAIO6pdYXy+6rPcue9dcu"},"sig-algo":{"type":"string","description":"Signature algorithm used","example":"SHA256withECDSA"}}}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad Request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"result":{"type":"object","properties":{"errcode":{"type":"string","description":"Error code","enum":["EZP001","EZP002","EZP003","EZP004","EZP005","EZP006","EZP007","EZP0010","EZP0011","EZP020","EZP021","EZP022"]},"status":{"type":"string","description":"Status","example":"failed"}}}},"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"result":{"type":"object","properties":{"errcode":{"type":"string","description":"Error code","enum":["EZP001","EZP002","EZP003","EZP004","EZP005","EZP006","EZP007","EZP0010","EZP0011","EZP020","EZP021","EZP022"]},"status":{"type":"string","description":"Status","example":"failed"}}}},"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"500":{"description":"Internal Server Error","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"result":{"type":"object","properties":{"errcode":{"type":"string","description":"Error
